name: Knowledge products posted by selected federal agencies: 2020
description: Knowledge products posted by selected federal agencies: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data are cumulative as of March 2020. Data are reported for the agencies whose laboratories have the largest R&D budgets.
sources: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine, 2021, Advancing Commercialization of Digital Products from Federal Laboratories, Table 7.2, https://doi.org/10.17226/26006; Data.gov; Code.gov.Science and Engineering Indicators
